channel.title: Tech
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from Tech, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Walmart-backed PhonePe winds down its Pincode app in yet another e-commerce step back
item.description: PhonePe has shut down its Pincode app over two years after its debut.

item.title: All the biggest news from AWS’ big tech show re:Invent 2025
item.description: Amazon Web Services' giant tech conference re:Invent 2025 is happening this week with news ranging from chips to AI services.

item.title: Chicago Tribune sues Perplexity
item.description: The newspaper is alleging copyright infringement and calling out Perplexity's retrieval augmented generation (RAG) as a culprit.

item.title: Feds ask Waymo about robotaxis repeatedly passing school buses in Austin
item.description: The agency already opened an investigation in October over Waymo's performance around school buses. Waymo said it issued a software update to its flee...

item.title: Micro1, a Scale AI competitor, touts crossing $100M ARR
item.description: Micro1 started the year with roughly $7 million ARR. Now, it claims to have surpassed $100 million in ARR, double what it reported in September.

item.title: The 67 Best Movies on Disney+, WIRED’s Picks (December 2025)
item.description: Madame Web, Love+War, and The Fantastic Four: First Steps are just a few of the movies you should be watching on Disney+ this month.

item.title: Anthropic CEO weighs in on AI bubble talk and risk-taking among competitors
item.description: Anthropic's CEO shared his thoughts on the economics of AI and the risk-taking of competitors, saying some were "YOLO-ing" with regard to spending.

item.title: Jon M. Chu Says AI Couldn’t Have Made One of Wicked’s Best Moments
item.description: The Wicked: For Good director says being able to improvise on set allows for the kind of moments that are hard for machines to make.

item.title: Musk says new Tesla software allows texting and driving, which is illegal in most states
item.description: Texting while driving is banned in nearly every state, even with the use of advanced driver-assistance systems like Tesla's Full Self-Driving (Supervi...

item.title: What Happens When Your Coworkers Are AI Agents
item.description: In this episode of Uncanny Valley, we talk to writer Evan Ratliff about how he created a small startup made entirely of AI employees—and what his find...
